abstract: Since November, Xbox LIVE Marketplace has offered video-on-demand downloads of movies and download-to-own episodes of television shows.
snippet: Since November, Xbox LIVE Marketplace has offered video-on-demand downloads of movies and download-to-own episodes of television shows.
lead_paragraph: Josh Roberts got his first video game system — Atari — when he was 4, and since then, “I’ve had all the latest and greatest systems,” said Mr. Roberts, 27, an advertising account executive. The roster includes various versions of Nintendo, Sega and Sony PlayStation, the original Microsoft Xbox and now its latest iteration, Xbox 360.

headline.main: Xbox Offers a Forum to Reach Gamers Where They Live
headline.print_headline: Xbox Offers a Forum to Reach Gamers Where They Live

abstract: A new report from IDC shows Microsoft and Oracle giving new competition to the leaders in this rapidly growing market.
snippet: A new report from IDC shows Microsoft and Oracle giving new competition to the leaders in this rapidly growing market.
lead_paragraph: It’s no secret that so-called business intelligence software has been a strong market lately, and why is no surprise. Companies are eager for any tools to help them navigate — and find a competitive advantage — in an ever-rising flood of digital information in customer databases, employee e-mails and reports, Web pages, blogs, RFID data and so on.

abstract: The stock surges for Local.com because it was granted two patents related to local searches and free, ad-supported 411 services. It’s potentially a huge business that companies like Google, Microsoft, Yahoo and others are fighting to dominate.
snippet: The stock surges for Local.com because it was granted two patents related to local searches and free, ad-supported 411 services. It’s potentially a huge business that companies like Google, Microsoft, Yahoo and others are fighting to dominate.
lead_paragraph: Local.com is one of many search engines specializing in finding hometown businesses and services like dry cleaners or restaurants. In May, it reported losses of $3.1 million for the first quarter of the year and forecast a slightly larger loss for the current quarter. And as of Thursday, shares of the Irvine, Calif.-based company were trading below $4.

headline.main: Gunning for Licensing Rights to Local Search
